name: --names[<n>]
comment: names that are recognised by the process

name: --baseConfigPath
comment: path to the root of the configuration files

name: --translations.<xxx>
comment: translations from one word to another

name: --alien
comment: alien value that cannot be documented further in this codebase

name: --documentedAlien
comment: configure the alien properties as documented at https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/jdk.xml.dom/org/w3c/dom/html/HTMLAnchorElement.html

name: --auditDataSource.schema
comment: datasource used for recording activity, database schema to use when accessing the datasource

name: --auditDataSource.url
comment: datasource used for recording activity, URL to use for accessing the datasource

name: --auditDataSource.user.group
comment: datasource used for recording activity, credentials to use for standard actions (DML), group (setter)

name: --auditDataSource.user.password
comment: datasource used for recording activity, credentials to use for standard actions (DML), password (field; setter has no Javadoc)

name: --auditDataSource.user.username
comment: datasource used for recording activity, credentials to use for standard actions (DML), username (setter)

name: --auditDataSource.adminUser.group
comment: datasource used for recording activity, credentials to use for preparing the database (DDL), group (setter)

name: --auditDataSource.adminUser.password
comment: datasource used for recording activity, credentials to use for preparing the database (DDL), password (field; setter has no Javadoc)

name: --auditDataSource.adminUser.username
comment: datasource used for recording activity, credentials to use for preparing the database (DDL), username (setter)

name: --auditDataSource.maxPoolSize
comment: datasource used for recording activity, maximum size of the connection pool

name: --logins.<xxx>.group
comment: login for a system, group (setter)

name: --logins.<xxx>.password
comment: login for a system, password (field; setter has no Javadoc)

name: --logins.<xxx>.username
comment: login for a system, username (setter)

name: --exitOnRun
comment: if true the process will end rather than waiting for requests

name: --when
comment: when it happened

name: --howLong
comment: how long something should wait

name: --value
comment: Set a value
